means: 立足处（攀登时脚踩的地方）
（在事业等方面可以进一步发展的）稳固地位

sentence.Network_en: I hung there, scrabbling with my feet to find a foothold.
sentence.Network_cn: 我吊在那儿，两脚乱蹬着寻找落脚点。

sentence.Network_en: The company is eager to gain a foothold in Europe.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家公司急于在欧洲取得一席之地。

sentence.Network_en: He found a secure foothold and pulled himself up.
sentence.Network_cn: 他找到了一个稳固的踏脚处并爬了上去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 首页-尚品鞋汇-- 淘宝网 ... chinela 拖鞋 foothold 凉鞋 Brand zone 品牌专区.
《趣味背单词》(免费) - 豆丁网 ... withhold( 抑制) 进城找个 foothold( 立足点) 此举全家 angel( 天使) 来到人间.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... exclusive zone 禁区 foothold 据点 fort 要塞，边塞.
Dictionary ... 立正 stand at attention 立足之地 foothold;footing 把梯子立起来。 Set up the ladder.

list.abs: on the fundamental foothold of constructing police philosophy with chinese characteristics ., 构建中国特色公安哲学的基本立足点.
it may be many years before the new company can gain a secure foothold in the market也许要经过若干年这家新公司才能在市场上取得稳固的立足点
Later , Debbie helped me get a foothold in New York ., 后来戴比帮我在纽约设立了一个立足点.
We have got a firm foothold in the European market ., 我们已在欧洲市场得到了一个稳定的立足点.

entry.def: A foothold is a strong or favourable position from which further advances or progress may be made.

example.ex: If British business is to have a successful future, companies must establish a firm foothold in Europe.
example.tran: 如果英国公司想在未来成功发展，就必须在欧洲建立稳固的基础。

entry.def: A foothold is a place such as a small hole or area of rock where you can safely put your foot when climbing.

example.ex: He lowered his legs until he felt he had a solid foothold on the rockface beneath him.
example.tran: 他把腿向下伸，直到他感觉稳稳地踩住下面的石头。

means.word_mean: 1. an area in hostile territory that has been captured and is held awaiting further troops and supplies;

sentences.sentence: "an attempt to secure a bridgehead behind enemy lines"
"the only foothold left for British troops in Europe was Gibraltar"

means.word_mean: 2. a place providing support for the foot in standing or climbing
3. an initial accomplishment that opens the way for further developments;

sentences.sentence: "the town became a beachhead in the campaign to ban smoking outdoors"
"they are presently attempting to gain a foothold in the Russian market"

auth_sentence.content: Nevertheless, al-Qaeda is working to gain a foothold.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nevertheless, al-Qaeda is working to gain a foothold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nevertheless, al-Qaeda is working to gain a foothold.

auth_sentence.content: Is it fear that religion will lose another foothold?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is it fear that religion will lose another foothold?

auth_sentence.content: Pay-TV services have gained a substantial foothold.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pay-TV services have gained a substantial foothold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pay-TV services have gained a substantial foothold.

Sentence.sentence: The bid went instead to Fuji, which exploited its sponsorship to win a permanent foothold in the marketplace.

means.word_mean: 立足处(攀登时脚踩的地方)

sentences.en: Climbers can strap sharp nails on to help get a foothold on a slippery slope.
sentences.cn: 登山运动员可以在靴子上捆上尖钉,这样有助于在很滑的陡坡上站住脚。

sentences.en: He found a secure foothold and pulled himself up.
sentences.cn: 他找到了一个稳固的踏脚处并爬了上去。

means.word_mean: (在事业等方面可以进一步发展的)稳固地位

sentences.en: I hope the textbook will provide a foothold for students of the subject.
sentences.cn: 我希望这本教材能让本专业的学生打下基础。
